label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_025
content:
## 2026-01-27 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 24,800 req | p50: 16 ms p95: 40.6 ms p99: 121 ms | err: 0.07% (18 refused + 8 rate-limited + 6 format errors) | success: 99.86%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 249 req | p50: 525 ms p95: 1215 ms p99: 2000 ms | err: 0% (0 failures) | success: 100%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS 121 req | p50: 20 ms p95: 50 ms p99: 100 ms | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /health-check: REQUESTS 1 req | p50: 10 ms p95: 20 ms p99: 30 ms | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /cache-refresh: REQUESTS 50 req | p50: 12 ms p95: 25 ms p99: 45 ms | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /config-update: REQUESTS 6 req | p50: 16 ms p95: 30 ms p99: 50 ms | err: 0% | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 26% | Mem 61% | Disk 80% | Conns: 1230 | Net: 78/110 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 20% | Mem 49% | Disk 59% | Conns: 1040 | Net: 60/76 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 46% | Mem 67% | Disk 56% | Conns: 3 | Net: 98/140 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 31% | Mem 72% | Disk 66% | Conns: N/A | Net: 15/20 Mbps | HSM slot utilization 65%

### Connection Pools
- dns-queries: active 150 | idle 50 | waiting 10 | exhaustion 0 | max 250 | avg_wait 5ms
- zone-transfers: active 20 | idle 5 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 30 | avg_wait 10ms
- cache-refresh: active 10 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 3ms
- config-updates: active 3 | idle 1 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 5 | avg_wait 2ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.0% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,200,000

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNS propagation delay on cloud edge sites: average 63s | p95: 150s
- [WARNING] Stale answer percentage: 0.3%
- [ERROR] Bogus validation event in DNSSEC: 1 event
- [INFO] Zone transfer success rate: 100%
- [INFO] IXFR requests: 216 | success rate: 99.4%
- [INFO] AXFR requests: 33 | success rate: 100%
- [INFO] TTL changes: 41 records across 6 zones | min: 300s | max: 86400s | median: 1800s
- [INFO] Change requests processed: 6 | applied: 6 | failed: 0 | mean apply time: 16 min
- [INFO] DNSSEC zones signed: 90 | signature refreshes: 121 | DS mismatch count: 0
- [INFO] Authority reachability: 99.99% | SOA mismatch: 0 | Lame delegation: 0

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 zones; enforced per-zone merge queue policy; no SOA serial mismatches observed.
- Updated secret store rotation procedure for TSIG keys with explicit expiry metadata; added alert 7 days before expiry.
- Closed out IaC module ownership conflict by adding CI check for duplicate record definitions.

### Events
- Post-DKIM rotation checks: sampled TXT answers from 15 external resolvers; confirmed new selectors present and old removed as expected.
- Migrated 16 zones; enforced per-zone merge queue policy; no SOA serial mismatches observed.
- Updated secret store rotation procedure for TSIG keys with explicit expiry metadata; added alert 7 days before expiry.
- Closed out IaC module ownership conflict by adding CI check for duplicate record definitions.

### On-Call
- Shift: S. Mehta. 1 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Stable; preventive controls added for TSIG key lifecycle and IaC duplication.
